name: List.all_iff_forall
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
p : α → Bool
l : List α
⊢ Iff (Eq (l.all p) Bool.true) (∀ (x : α), Membership.mem l x → Eq (p x) Bool.true)

name: List.all_iff_forall_prop
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
p : α → Prop
inst✝ : DecidablePred p
l : List α
⊢ Iff (Eq (l.all fun a => Decidable.decide (p a)) Bool.true) (∀ (a : α), Membership.mem l a → p a)
decl:
theorem all_iff_forall_prop : (all l fun a => p a) ↔ ∀ a ∈ l, p a := by
  simp

name: List.any_iff_exists
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
p : α → Bool
l : List α
⊢ Iff (Eq (l.any p) Bool.true) (Exists fun x => And (Membership.mem l x) (Eq (p x) Bool.true))

name: List.any_iff_exists_prop
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
p : α → Prop
inst✝ : DecidablePred p
l : List α
⊢ Iff (Eq (l.any fun a => Decidable.decide (p a)) Bool.true) (Exists fun a => And (Membership.mem l a) (p a))
decl: theorem any_iff_exists_prop : (any l fun a => p a) ↔ ∃ a ∈ l, p a := by simp

name: List.any_of_mem
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
l : List α
a : α
p : α → Bool
h₁ : Membership.mem l a
h₂ : Eq (p a) Bool.true
⊢ Eq (l.any p) Bool.true
decl:
theorem any_of_mem {p : α → Bool} (h₁ : a ∈ l) (h₂ : p a) : any l p :=
  any_eq_true.2 ⟨_, h₁, h₂⟩
